page.title: 16First Holy Communion 1
page.content: Holy Communion is a sacrament which children receive when they are the age of seven.They come to the church with their families.For the children who are making their communion it is a very special day. The girls making their communion wear white.The dresses are usually trimmed with white lace.They have new prayer books and rosary beads.The boys wear a suit which is usually any colour.They also have a new prayer book and beads. Before coming into the chapel the family sometimes take photographs. They normally take them coming out.
